tweet.text: Razzle dazzle ✨, flying saucers 🛸, sextuplets… this January 1954 document has it all! No wonder our historians voted this telegram a staff #FavoriteFRUS View the whole #FRUS document, for the ol’ razzle dazzle: https://t.co/vxVJ6bAjlP https://t.co/TdsjkdEEEn
